name: Space Heist (Alex_Kohl)
description:
It was a simple grab and go job. How were you supposed to know what you were grabbing was the gravity stabilizer for the entire ship. But coming back empty handed is worse than death. Time to leave, orb in hand, dodging pitfalls and deadly gears along the way.

Features:

  • Gravity Rifts that pull players towards the sky
  • Deadly gear traps 
  • Harrowing jumps
  • Getaway jet

Credits:

All assets credited to "Moon Tribe" for Dungeon Crawler 2D Art Pack on Unity
